component_description: Single Page Application providing end-user UI for all modules
Handles SSO, role-based access, and permissions using claims-based auth integrated with external Identity Management (OAuth/SAML)
Displays and manages Prefix data, including capacity counters and linking to product/location creation
Create/manage product records (GINs), images, hierarchies, barcodes, and exports
Create/manage location records (LNs), hierarchies, verification, and exports
End-user search, filters, saved views, and report launchers
Contextual help, tutorials, and training links embedded in SPA
User start screen with alerts, tasks, counters, and shortcuts
Record approval, status tracking, and locking UX
UI to publish/share data and manage subscriptions
Bulk import/export UX with progress, validation, and error review
Capture user feedback, ratings, and route to admins
Display record history and change logs
Shared client-side utilities (logging hooks, health pings, feature flags)
Handles prefix licensing, capacity tracking, and lookup for GIN/LN creation
CRUD operations for company prefixes and metadata
Tracks usage and available capacity per prefix
Validates prefix format and compliance rules
Manages visibility and sharing of prefix data
Advanced search and filtering for prefix data
Manages creation, editing, hierarchy, sharing of GINs and product metadata
CRUD for product records and GINs
Manages creation, editing, hierarchy, sharing of LNs and location metadata
CRUD for location records and LNs
Exports and simple reports for LNs
Provides search, view, subscription, and export functionality for shared Prefix, GIN, and LN data
Performs advanced search and filtering across Prefix, GIN, and LN datasets
Displays record details, including basic/full data and hierarchy
Handles subscription requests for accessing full record views
Processes join requests for controlled groups
Exports records to CSV/Excel/XML and prints
Determines view level based on roles/subscriptions
Surfaces payment info for ad-hoc access (out of scope payments)
Indexed shared data optimized for queries
Central API entry; policies, routing, throttling, analytics; migration from 3Scale
Migrate definitions, plans, policies to APIM
Route to internal services by path/version
JWT, quota, CORS, caching, IP filtering
Multi-channel notifications (email, SMS, push, in-app) with templates and preferences
Consumes events and creates notification intents
Render content with variables and i18n
Help content, tutorials, search, localization, and feedback capture
Adapters and pipelines for SAP and QuickBooks integrations
IDoc/XML/JSON via SAP PI/PO or APIs
Consumes CDC events and indexes denormalized docs into Elasticsearch
Near real-time API usage analytics via Log Analytics → ADX, served in Power BI
Cross-region HA/DR, backups, automation, and chaos validation
